mapper.insert: insert into mid_houseinfo ( sysguid, buycertnos, regionname, bldname, cellname, floorname, roomno, buynames, houseAddress ) values ( SYS_GUID(), #{param.buycertnos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.regionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.bldname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.cellname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.floorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.roomno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.buynames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param.houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select t.bldname from arc_buildinfo t where t.bldno = '602609053'
